description: Monitor for changes made to files that may use hidden users to mask the presence of user accounts they create or modify. Monitor for changes made to the /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow plist file for unexpected modifications to the Hide500Users key value on macOS.(Citation: Cybereason OSX Pirrit)

external_references.description: Amit Serper. (2016). Cybereason Lab Analysis OSX.Pirrit. Retrieved December 10, 2021.
